website_summaries.verdict: A rugged and solid performer that comes with plenty of accessories.
pros: Decent price that includes a full range of accessories
Very good for outdoor use, too
cons: Range only up to three miles, but reception is very clear

customer_reviews.title: Professional Radios That Surpass Other Brands on the Market Today
customer_reviews.text: We just received these radios. Compared to others we've tried, these are the best so far. They are sturdy, simple to use, and transmit and receive well. We highly recommend these radios over other brands made today. They are well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Lesley L. Young

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Had a defective paid the first time around. Contacted the company and they helped me out a ton and sent out a new unit. Even sent me over programming information and assisted me with programming the radios. These work great in a School event setting in addition to road trips!
customer_reviews.author: Luigi

customer_reviews.title: Received the wrong model. I ordered the T518 and ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, I already have more than 50 units of this model and have not got a single problem.
customer_reviews.author: johnnycr

customer_reviews.title: Work Well and Long Range
customer_reviews.text: My Granddaughter is having lots of fun with her friends using these Two Way Radios. Now the rest of the Grandchildren want them.
customer_reviews.author: J. Connor

customer_reviews.title: Ordered several sets of these and couldn't be more pleased with how they work in a school setting
customer_reviews.text: Ordered several sets of these and couldn't be more pleased with how they work in a school setting. Great product and great service.
customer_reviews.author: Annette M. Rizzo

customer_reviews.title: Great radio BUT......
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality and sound. Do NOT leave battery in charger after charge is full. Destroys battery permanently and no spare batteries are available anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I tried to call my kids from our kitchen on the 1st floor when they are on the 3rd floors . It sounds very clear and great.Satisfied with the working range .Recommend .
customer_reviews.author: Jianhua Zhang

customer_reviews.title: Great Product.  Good sales service.
customer_reviews.text: This set of walkies does the job. Good product and dependable.
customer_reviews.author: dad1253

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: The transmitter button stopped working on one of the radios after only a few minutes of use. I wouldn't recommend this radio.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Shapiro

customer_reviews.title: Really good radios
customer_reviews.text: Really good radios, they look durable and sturdy. The battery can standby for a long time. No complain .
customer_reviews.author: Zhen

customer_reviews.title: Charging batteries
customer_reviews.text: Used radios twice, be very careful to follow instructions on how to charge batteries . Three out of 4 radios I purchased ,the batteries would not charge, apparently I charged the batteries improperly. The radioes work Great up to that point
customer_reviews.author: Raymond H Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Super bummed
customer_reviews.text: I was shocked when I received dirty and used walkie talkies. I needed them on a certain day for a gift and I had to return them because they were gross and used. I had to ship them back and it took a couple more weeks to receive new ones. A huge hassle and nothing was none about it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 1 of the walkie talkies in the set does not ...
customer_reviews.text: 1 of the walkie talkies in the set does not work. Will be returning set. Very disappointing since they did not arrive on time and now have to be sent back.
customer_reviews.author: R. Rossi

customer_reviews.title: Radios are good, I tested them and the max is 1 ...
customer_reviews.text: Radios are good, I tested them and the max is 1 mile in my area. Should be better for a 5 watt radio. I deducted stars because you can't get any support for the radios or information on how to program the buttons.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Waterproof Two Way Radio LSENG T-518 Emergency Walkie Talkies with VOX Function (Pair)
product_meta.description:
LSENG T-518 5 watts waterproof two way radios long range :2 pcs

When and where do you need this radio ? 
This radio is helpful for the following circumstances: security guard, supermarket connection, construction area indication, outdoor travel. 

What’s the cover range ? 
Cover about 3 miles outdoor, about 20 floors in buildings. 

Why you choose LSENG T-518?
We are the manufacturer of the "LSENG",we can offer high-quality product for you and the product QC 100% before shipping. Please kindly check the 20 Features blow for why you choose LSENG T-518! 

Features: 
High/low power selective
FCC and CE approval
ANI and PTT-ID
VOX function
Frequency Range: UHF 400-480MHz 
Memory Channel: 16 
CTCSS/DCS function 
Low battery alarm 
Scanning
Single call, Group call
Support PC software programmable/ Chinese and English voice prompt
Priority scan
Wide/narrow bandwidth selective
Emergency alarm
IP54 rainproof, Dust proof, Shockproof
Busy channel lock
Transmitter time-out timer(TOT) 
Side key assignment 
0-9 grades squelch level setting
Power saving

Specification: 
Model: T-518
Antenna Impedance: 50ohm 
Battery type: Li-ion battery,1200mAh 
Rated Voltage: DC 7.4V 
Output power: 5W 
Working temperature: -30~+60°C 
Dual band or Single band: Single band 
Dual frequency or Single frequency: Single frequency

This Listing Including:
2× LSENG T518 two way radio body
2× Antenna 
2× Li-ion battery pack 
2× Charger 
2× Belt clip 
2× Hand Strip 
2× English User's manual

Easy to program:
Please contact us, we will provide the Program Software, Drive of USB Software, Video of Setting step for free. 

Warranty: 
Radio body Provides 12 Months/ Battery and charger 6 months warranty.
feature_bullets: 1.Waterproof Two Way Radio with IP65 Waterproof(Rainproof),and Dustproof, Shockproof .
2.5W Two Way Radio Long Range with Working Range:1.8~3.1Miles,1-2 Days Stand By and 4-5 Hours Charge.
3.Emergency Walkie Talkies with Emergency Button and PC Software Programmable, Encrypted Programming Software.
4.Rechargeable Walkie Talkies, Easy To Use for All People, Good Sounds Especially with VOX Function.
5.Best Two Way Radio FCC and Outdoor Two Way Radio CE Approval & ANI and PTT-ID.
